synopsis: In episode #13, Devam shares a heartfelt solo journey of self-discovery after quitting his job, exploring the importance of taking a break to reconnect with oneself and find fulfillment. He discusses his travels, new passions like DJing, and the challenges of managing expectations while embracing the process of life.
quotes: You need to have a good day every day. I need to feel fulfilled in some way.
We're not on this planet to slave away and be like productivity monkeys creating value for our bosses.
Sometimes it's enough to just breathe. Like that's okay.
If I go back to it, I want to do it because I like it.
It's important to recognize that and choose to participate in it instead of feeling like you have to.
Letting go of big expectations makes such a big difference.
It's not about the results. It's about the process.
Your time and your energy are valuable.
If you're just staying numb and in the same cycles of stress and release, you're not helping anyone.
